headline: Willis Lease enters leading partnership with Blackstone Credit & Insurance
summary: Willis Lease Finance Corporation (WLFC) and Blackstone Credit & Insurance (BX) announced a strategic aircraft engine leasing partnership with plans to deploy over $1 billon in the next two years in current and next generation aircraft engines and select aircraft. This unique partnership brings together a leading engine leasing specialist with Blackstone’s scaled private credit business to focus on the engine asset class.The partnership leverages WLFC’s established position as a pioneer in aircra

headline: Blackstone Energy Transition Partners Announces Acquisition of Alliance Technical Group
summary: NEW YORK, January 06, 2026--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) announced today that funds affiliated with Blackstone Energy Transition Partners and other Blackstone funds ("Blackstone") have acquired Alliance Technical Group ("ATG"), a leading provider of environmental testing, monitoring, and compliance services.

raw.headline: Blackstone Energy Transition Partners Announces Acquisition of Alliance Technical Group
raw.summary: NEW YORK, January 06, 2026--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) announced today that funds affiliated with Blackstone Energy Transition Partners and other Blackstone funds ("Blackstone") have acquired Alliance Technical Group ("ATG"), a leading provider of environmental testing, monitoring, and compliance services.

headline: Trump's MAGA Inc. Amasses Over $300 Million In Funds— This AI Startup Co-Founder Is The Top Donor
summary: In a recent disclosure, a super Political Action Committee (PAC) aligned with President Donald Trump has amassed a significant amount of over $304 million, a move that could majorly influence the upcoming midterm elections. Tech And Wall Street Fuel MAGA Inc. MAGA Inc., the PAC aligned with Trump, has accumulated a substantial cash reserve between July 1 and December 22. A significant share of the total came from Greg Brockman, OpenAI's co-founder, who donated $25 million to the super PAC in Sep

headline: Blackstone: Not A Bargain, But Disciplined Upside Exists
summary: Blackstone is trading close to its 2021 valuations, whereas the business has grown considerably since then. Read why I rate BX stock a Buy now.
